DOC.HEADLINE: HEARTS OF L.A. / HOW THE QUAKE ROCKED OUR SPIRITS AND CHANGED OUR LIVES ; THE STAFF
DOC.TEXT: * Editors : Narda Zacchino , Tim Rutten , Claudia Luther , Charlie Waters , Dick Barnes * Interviewers : Robin Abcarian , Beverly Beyette , Patricia Ward Biederman , Jeff Brazil , Henry Chu , Tammerlin Drummond , Diane Haithman , Maria La Ganga , Gebe Martinez , Dennis McLellan , Judith Michaelson , Michael Quintanilla , Roy Rivenburg , Lynn Smith , Bob Welkos * Cover text : Bill Boyarsky * News editors : Jon Thurber , Frank Farrar * Art_directors : Tom Trapnell , Diana Shantic * Copy chiefs : Jill-Marie Jones , Darcelle Infante * Copy_editors : Barbara Chuck , Karin Dominello , Kathy Gosnell , Adrienne Johnson , Marilyn Kuehler , Jan Molen , Ed Sakamoto , David Scheiderer , Lauren Tsujimoto * Photo editors : Fred Sweets , Cindy Hively * Researchers : Dan Malcor , Christina Chaplin * Production editor : David Rickley
